website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for those looking for a basic electric shear for small projects.
pros: Two-finger trigger offers fine control over the speed of the three-blade cutter
Included lock-on button is more ergonomic for long cuts
cons: Takes longer to cut through thick, hard metals like steel than other shear options

customer_reviews.title: Good for a big job or two. Business end just doesn't stand up to heavy use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to speed the demolition of an old, single wide mobile home. It was clear from the start this was NOT the equivalent to big name brands know for their high quality. The lower jaws of the nibbler tended to spread over time, causing poor cuts, forcing you to wrangle the tool at all times to keep it cutting. I would say this is a tool for a couple of big jobs at best, then just give it to Goodwill, and write off your donation. Wish I could have left a better review. :(
customer_reviews.author: Keith S.

customer_reviews.title: No bigger then 16 gage.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these expecting to be able to use them on a higher gauge with it less effective. However it doesn't even move on a higher gauge so check the description verify the gauge and know what you're trying to cut. But it is good for the described gauge you have to hold it up a little and it goes it's kind of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D J

customer_reviews.title: These shears are the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: Product is amazing for cutting 16 guage welded wire. Prior to this I used tin snips and it was an ardous task to say the least trying to cut through a lot of wire. This tool zips through the wire like a hot knife through butter, and makes the job a breeze. Cant beat these shears for function and ease of use!
customer_reviews.author: John Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Great device. Had to remove old HVAC sheet metal duct work. Reciprocal saw would have been more noisy and work. Only had to use the reciprocal for the joins.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Awww.
customer_reviews.text: Hey I was not impressed, really! The cutter head was constantly binding and you have to pay attention and keep being engaged to every snip of the jaws. A bit clunky and mediocre.
customer_reviews.author: shewhue

customer_reviews.title: flat good -
customer_reviews.text: works well on flat smooth surface. got it cut metal roofing - does work so good for that.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent tool, fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Had for a while, I use it occasionally at work a few hours a month. Works well, does not get hot but I only use it for fairly short periods on 16-20ga aluminum. Had for a few months and still working great, decent cuts and no burrs.
customer_reviews.author: DIYdude

customer_reviews.title: shears for metal
customer_reviews.text: worked great cut everything i put in front of it to cut it is quick and does a very neat job would buy again only thing im not sure where to get replacement blades for it i havent looked real hard yet but will need them some day
customer_reviews.author: Allen C Jackson

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: works as good as a brand name tool, but much less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Does not cut 18 guage stainless
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cute 18g stainless steel sheet. It barely cut and halfway through a piece the cutting mechanism broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! MAn, I love this thing! the shop that sold me the roofing tried to sell me a $100 cutter that would attaché to my drill motor....this thing was 1/2 that price and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I bought this to cut 20ga. Galvanized Steel and it buzzed through 26 sheets without any problem!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. James J. Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Metal shear cut well but switch was inferior, but Amazon sent a replacement so all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This metal sheer performed very well with all the sheetmetal I cut.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!!
customer_reviews.text: Someone ordered a lot of fire dampers with the wrong size sleeve. They’re 16ga, cutters worked great, clean cuts and saved a lot of time.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use and helped us cut the metal we need for projects.
customer_reviews.author: TommyboyKarnofski

product_meta.title: TruePower 01-0161 Heavy-Duty Electric Metal Shear with Swivel Head
product_meta.description: The Variable Speed Electric Head Shear is designed for a high-volume work load and delivers on all fronts. Cutting up to 150-Inch per minute, this shear cuts both sheet and steel metal with equal ease. with its variable speed function, you control the timing and precision of your cuts; guaranteeing a job-well-done each and every time.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars43 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
